generated_passage: Inside this envelope, you will find a needle and thread to bind this book. Begin from the outside following the diagram provided. Thread the needle through the center of the book, leaving an end outside. Then, pass it from the outside to about 2 inches from the center, and back inside 2 inches from the center on the other end. Finally, bring the thread back through the center and tie the ends in a knot on each side of the cord outside. This book is part of the CHILD'S OWN BOOK OF GREAT MUSICIANS series by Thomas Tapper. After completing this task, blank pages at the back of the book are for writing a story about the musician. This series not only provides an enjoyable task but also educates children about the lives of famous musicians.
